Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with private shower, phone, radio. Wheelchair access, room service, coffee house, tour desk, laundry, parking on charge. Conference room capacity: 80 persons. Opened 1964, Revonations 1994.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located near to Prague's largest park Stromovka and also the National Gallery of Modern Arts, 2km north of center. Nearest station/metro: South of train station. Nearest airport: 20km.
